original_title: Paris By Night 80: Tết Khắp Mọi Nhà
overview: Paris By Night 80: Tết Khắp Mọi Nhà (English translation: Lunar New Year Spreads Through Every House) is a Paris By Night program produced by Thúy Nga that was filmed at the Canadian Broadcasting Centre at the Toronto, Canada on October 29, 2005.
title: Paris By Night 80: Tết Khắp Mọi Nhà
